definitions.definition: Any of various animals having ten legs or similar appendages , especially mollusks such as squid and cuttlefish .
Any crustacean , of the order Decapoda , such as crabs or lobsters .
A nickname for either the 0-10-0 or 2-10-0 train configurations . Sometimes capitalized.

main_definition: ( zoology ) Any of various animals having ten legs or similar appendages , especially mollusks such as squid and cuttlefish .
secondary_definitions: ( zoology ) Any crustacean , of the order Decapoda , such as crabs or lobsters .
( rail transport ) A nickname for either the 0-10-0 or 2-10-0 train configurations . Sometimes capitalized.
